channel.title: Is it me or is WoW the most boring fucking thing on the planet?
channel.description:
So i finally tried it out, and after doing the beginning quests to reach a decent level and started trying the very small range of PvP bgs i realized how pointless and _fucking_ boring it was. You do a shitload of quests that all result in nothing. You kill something, get a reward, buy better stuff to kill the next something with and so on. An online game has meaning to me if its competitive with other people (ie unlocking shit and beating the hell out of other people with it), but WoW somehow escaped this by creating a very small pvp system and making everything take forever to get. My only slight motivation to keep playing past level 11 was to get a mount. So to save myself the time i said "whats the point", alt+f4 and came here to start ranting.
Note: this isnt a rant on me comparing WoW to runescape and saying rs is better. Its more of a why cant i find jack shit to do on WoW but there was always stuff to do on rs.
Surprisingly, I now am liable to form my opinion in saying runescape kicks WoW's ass. (I no longer play rs btw) Runescape wins because it has a much more wide variety of safe PvP games where you can safely flaunt your new items. Quite fairly to, with the exception of the gs. It gives you motivation to do quests. A level 40 asks "Wow, how do you do that??" reply: "Oh, this? Its a spell you get from the quest desert treasure." Boom, right there. That level 40 now has one more thing to add to his list of stuff he wants to get and more of a reason to keep playing.
WoW and runescape are both pointless and boring, but runescape succeeds in holding my attention much longer.
How does someone waste their life on WoW? The damn thing doesnt hold your attention after you get past the new gameplay. Ill admit, this game was pretty decent at first. It was a great concept. Id love to fuck around with friends on wow but theres simply nothing left to do after 6 hours of playing. So if you play WoW, tell me what you do on it that makes you keep wasting $15 a month. Apparently im missing something.

item.title: Is it me or is WoW the most boring fucking thing on the planet?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:65, topic:350911”]Nah, i just realized it again.

You spend a few years questing to level and get better stuff to do better quests and then eventually get with a group of people to kill a giant monster to get more stuff to kill more giant monsters.

Pointless. Again, i dont see how anyone gets addicted to this game and they’re all to hooked to admit how pointless it is. And i hate when idiots say ‘dur well al games r pointless’[/quote]
In retrospect, ALL games are pointless, because they do nothing for your IRL, unless they have some kinda hidden RL reward when you get to a certain point.

I agree though, WoW is a very boring game, but that is because there really is no chatting going on there like on others that I play. I’m more of a social gaming person, so it just seemed too quiet to me.

Read full topic

item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:59, topic:350911”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=447263.msg3291805#msg3291805 date=1280664235]

I made it to level 20, and honestly now i feel like theres jack shit to do. Nothing but quests. Before 20 i wanted to kill things to level up and get my mount, i did that and now theres nothing left.

Some game…
[/quote]Just a tip for some fun and easy leveling. Use Dungeon Finder Tool. < Gets you into dungeons + LOTS OF XP + awesome armour.

I cant ever find a group though[/quote]it will find it automatically, sometimes it takes time. But when you start doing dungeons, it’s very fun

item.title: Is it me or is WoW the most boring fucking thing on the planet?
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:47, topic:350911”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=447263.msg3286883#msg3286883 date=1280255995]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=447263.msg3286863#msg3286863 date=1280255090]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=447263.msg3286801#msg3286801 date=1280253038]
The only thing WoW has going for it is that it’s hack and slash and provides a larger variety of attacks and ways to approach your opponent. Runescape provides a much more realistic world, with much much more things to do.
[/quote]did you really just call runescape realistic, or in the slightest sense realistic? … you said that about modern warfare 2 also… what fucking planet are you on dude cuz i wanna go there
[/quote]same.
a guy with 10 str can hit higher then one with 99str.
proven fact.
/facepalm
[/quote]You’re both pretty dumb. Do you know what the term realistic means? Because nothing can be perfect. Modern warfare is the most realistic game I know of, otherwise tell me a game that’s more realistic.

@pure2ownage, there’s a thing called chance? Which IS realistic. There’s a percentage in what you can hit, giving you possibilities.

Yes, Runescape is more realistic than WoW. All you fucking do in WoW is kill shit, rather than in RS you’re given more story based tasks and the choice of what-- like 13 different skills to train? There is more realism in that than in WoW’s kill-fight-kill concept.[/quote]Id say battlefield bad company 2 is mroe realistic then Mw2

Read full topic
